meanings.definition: A small, brightly colored fish found in coastal waters.
meanings.sent1: The pinfishes swam gracefully in the clear ocean.
meanings.sent2: We saw a school of pinfishes near the shore.
meanings.sent3: The pinfishes decided to have a colorful party underwater.
meanings.sent4: The pinfishes shimmered like tiny jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the vibrant hues of the pinfishes.

meanings.definition: Plural form of pinfish, referring to multiple individuals of the species.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the pinfishes swimming together in harmony.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught many pinfishes for bait.
meanings.sent3: The pinfishes held a meeting to discuss their next move.
meanings.sent4: The pinfishes in the tank seemed to gossip among themselves.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium was filled with the lively movements of the pinfishes.
